mapper.sql: id, type, name, create_id, create_name, create_date, modify_id, modify_name, modify_date, category, seq
mapper.select:
select
from rad_wordbook where 1=1
and type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and name like '%${name}%'
order by category,seq
mapper.insert: insert into rad_wordbook (type, name, create_id, create_name, create_date, modify_id, modify_name, modify_date, category, seq) values (#{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{category,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into rad_wordbook
id,
type,
name,
create_id,
create_name,
create_date,
modify_id,
modify_name,
modify_date,
category,
seq,

mapper.update:
update rad_wordbook
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_name = #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
category = #{category,jdbcType=TINYINT},
seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update rad_wordbook set type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_id = #{modifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_name = #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, category = #{category,jdbcType=TINYINT}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
